alert.note: Alert for Cherokee (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 10 at 11:47PM CDT until April 11 at 12:45AM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Springfield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Cherokee County in southeastern Kansas... Southeastern Barton County in southwestern Missouri... Jasper County in southwestern Missouri... * Until 1245 AM CDT. * At 1146 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Purcell to near Treece, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Joplin... Carthage... Webb City... Carl Junction... Lamar... Baxter Springs... Galena... Oronogo... Carterville... Duquesne... Duenweg... Jasper... Airport Drive... Lowell... Alba... Purcell... Nashville... Carytown... Fidelity... Asbury... This includes the following highways... Interstate 44 near mile marker 0, and between mile markers 10 and 17. Interstate 49 between mile markers 36 and 64. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
